about_the_game:
This DLC enables you to save arts to your computer. After activation you will get a button in the main menu.

After pressing this button, it will start the process of copying arts in the Gallery folder, which is located in the game folder. The folder should open after copying is completed.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity sexual content
-Not suitable for all ages
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old

detailed_description:
This DLC enables you to save arts to your computer. After activation you will get a button in the main menu.

After pressing this button, it will start the process of copying arts in the Gallery folder, which is located in the game folder. The folder should open after copying is completed.
name: Hentai Office - Arts
short_description: This DLC gives you the option to save the arts to your computer
